name: Cane & Upholstered Dining Chair with Arms - Natural
description: The Cane Rattan and Upholstered Dining chair with arms marries together the softness of our textiles with the impactful silhouette of the iconic chair design. The chair features a solid teak frame stained to protect the natural wood, a handwoven natural cane rattan backrest. For additional comfort, the upholstered seat has been constructed using the highest quality foam padding. Customize with your preferred fabric. The chair is designed to fit a dining space but can also be styled as an accent chair in a living room or bedroom. Our designers have also styled it as a luxe desk chair; the softness of the fabric and richly padded seat make the chair the ideal mid-century modern addition to your office.
